casebody.data:
Tillie STEWART
v.
James R. SHIPLEY, DPM, Instride Mt. Airy Foot and Ankle Specialists, PLLC d/b/a Mt. Airy Foot & Ankle Center, and Northern Hospital District of Surry County No. 125P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Amanda C. Dure, Joseph L. Anderson, Winston-Salem, Attorneys at Law, For Stewart, Tillie G. Gray Wilson, Lorin J. Lapidus, Attorneys at Law, Winston-Salem, For Shipley, James R. (DPM), et al.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of April 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: "Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019." Davis, J. recused
